main event: An American Airlines flight observed a bright unidentified flying object while en route from Albany to Syracuse over Schenectady on April 8, 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as a brilliant white light that moved parallel to the aircraft., The UFO appeared to change color from white to orange and then red., Ground observers at Griffiss Air Force Base confirmed the sighting., The object exhibited speeds faster than conventional aircraft and made sharp turns., The incident was eventually attributed to the planet Venus, raising questions about the initial identification.
sighted object: Bright orange light in the sky
witness description: American Airlines crew members, including Captain Raymond E. Ryan and passengers
